title: Marcelo Bielsa
summary: Marcelo Alberto Bielsa Caldera[2] (American Spanish: [maɾˈselo alˈβeɾto ˈβjelsa],[lower-alpha 1] nicknamed El Loco Bielsa [ˈloko ˈβjelsa],[lower-alpha 1] meaning "The Crazy Bielsa"; born 21 July 1955) is an Argentine professional football manager and the head coach of Premier League club Leeds United. He is a former player and played as a defender for Newell's Old Boys, Instituto, and Argentino de Rosario.
